title: Raven Flight
description: Six years ago, Ronne Donovan briefly died when an IED exploded next to the Humvee she rode. She crossed the Veil and Lady Raven made her an offer: agree to serve her and return to life. Ronne agreed and in return received a raven ring and a raven companion named Shado. Serving Lady Raven also brought membership into the Raven Council. After performing a variety assignments for the Council, which includes earning a PhD in Linguistics, Ronne finds herself with a more difficult assignment. She needs to find the current owner of the special Raven Ring created by Lady Raven over five hundred years ago. 18,670 Words. Also included is the first two chapters from Ravenwyng Chronicles Volume 1: The Beginning. 3224 Words
author: Anna Dobritt
